title: [Large-Scale] Metacognition-Based Simulation Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic control engineering and social systems analysis concepts
context.additional_context: A process of performing complex social system simulations using VR content optimized for smartphone-based mobile learning and metacognitive support tools

learning_goals: Learners can plan a social system simulation learning process in three or more stages using a metacognitive framework.
Learners can achieve an 85% or higher learning goal attainment rate using navigation support tools in a VR environment.
Learners can improve and apply at least two metacognitive strategies through weekly reflective journaling and feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
